GSD.description:
drm/dp: Don't rewrite link config when setting phy test pattern

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 1bb6f4a8db5ae91194973f98e0b43d5dde3889c4. For more details please see the references link.
